ygData.subject: RE: Purity belt... *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: I can only say what he told me - we did stop to con him first.  Now, it s entirely possible that he targeted Gix pet and as often happens the complete name was
ygData.messageBody:
I can only say what he told me - we did stop to con him first. Now, it's
entirely possible that he targeted Gix pet and as often happens the complete
name was truncated - so the con he got was off the pet and not actually Gix.

Sylly

p.s. nice to finally meet you online!

-----Original Message-----
From: Jesse [mailto:j@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 7:24 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*

From: Jesse <j@...>


> Me (15) and my Pallidin friend (22) attacked Kisdean Gix
DEF in West
> Commonlands. He conned green to my friend. I had a dirk
and my friend had 2h
> combine. Neither one of us hit for more than dmg 2 while
Gix was laying

> Sylly
> Bard of the 15th level
> a.k.a. Robo-Bard
> camped out somewhere on Innoruuk

Are you sure he con'd green? I don't know the level of your
friend, but
Kizdean Gix con'd yellow to me at 22 or so.

Maybe your friend accidentally con'd a kodiak or something.
